Our Datacentres:usflag::ukflag:

We have a global datacentre presence, with space in datacentre locations such as: Buffalo USA, London UK, Maidstone UK.
Having multiple datacentres really allows us to offer enterprise VPS servers in any of our locations giving our customers the opportunity to choose.
All of our datacentres have a tier-1 IP Transit providing you with premium bandwidth and excellent low latency performance


A Real ISO 27001 Certified Company

We are not running from a bedroom so you can be sure that your data is safe and protected by a real business.
This is further backed up by our ISO 27001 certification which shows our commitment to our customers and how we protect your precious data.

Money back if you not happy

We are proud to offer everyone a 7 day money back guarantee on all of our reseller, shared and VPS hosting packages.
We can do this because we are super confident you will love our service and magical support.
If you have a valid reason as to why you are not happy with the service or performance we will be happy to give you a full refund.

24x7 Magical Support:usflag::ukflag:

Here at HostusPocus we provide everyone with the same level of magical support to ensure that we are there for you when you need us.
